basics.name: Davide Carminati
basics.label: Research Engineer
basics.summary: Self-motivated, independent researcher in the field of robotics and Bayesian methods and algorithms. His research is focused on real-time stochastic models specifically designed to work on mobile robots for environment modelling by means of depth sensors and system identification. He has experience in control design and embedded system programming. Currently exploring parallel implementation of Bayesian methods for real-time robotic applications involving environment modelling and state estimation.
